text: It's New Years Day, and you've decided to make a resolution to lose weight. How does it go?

options.option: Give up in the first few days, it's too hard.
Try harder but ultimately fail because of lack of motivation
Succeed until the end, because that's how you roll!

text: What kind of pet do you like?

options.option: Cats! Meow.
Dogs are where it's at!
A fish lasts a lifetime.

text: You are in the last mile of a marathon, what do you do?

options.option: Dance to taunt the people behind you!
Power forward!
Take it slow and steady to conserve energy.

text: What kind of grades do you get in school?

options.option: Who needs grades?
You don't need to know.
Fs because I skip class every day.

text: You see a bunch of instruments on the ground, which one do you take?

options.option: Electric guitar.
Indian drums.
Ukulele!

text: So did you have a nice day yesterday?

options.option: I think I did have a nice day yesterday, it was quite enjoyable.
I can't remember what I did yesterday.
I had a terrible day.

text: If you missed the bus, how would you react?

options.option: Who cares man, I don't need no education.
Time to get the bike out!
Unleash the rage on some other things!

text: Someone steals your backpack! You see the guy later on, what do you do?

options.option: Grab your gang and take him out!
Go tell a teacher!
Ask for it back.

text: Are you impressed with my programming magic?

options.option: Yes, it is quite nice actually.
Could be better.
